caption.p: Host factors that influence the occurrence, course, or severity of disease

tr.td: 4. Genetic factors controlling an enormous array of immune response elements
5. Preexisting level of specific or nonspecific immunity
7. Behavior and lifestyle: sexual practices, smoking, alcohol, and recreational drugs
8. Dual infection or superinfection with other agents
11. Psychological status (e.g., motivation, emotional crises, attitudes toward illness) [ 8]
